ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Guilds
ygData.msgSnippet: Ian, came across this old email. Did you ever get into one? I am going to in the near future start one of my own designed for the majority to be under 20 with
ygData.messageBody:
Ian,

came across this old email.

Did you ever get into one?
I am going to in the near future start one of my own
designed for the majority to be under 20 with the
purpose of helping each other out and finding others
to group with.

I feel early levels will foster developing
friendships. Although I would welcome twinkies, I
would not want to promote it.

For instance the guild am currently a memeber of, will
SELL hand me down items but or run events to give them
away but never just to make them better than most at
their level.

Just me ranting......

Rob


--- ian johnstone <ikestarwolf@...> wrote:

<HR>
<html>

<div style='background-color:'><DIV>
<P>Hi all</P>
<P>I am looking to join a Guild, i was a member of the
Clan Silver Wolf Guild but they only play on fironia
Vie server, which i just left as i wanted to try a
server without any of the rulesets, so i migrated to
the Druzil Ro server, but i miss the comradeship of
the guild, and end up spending most of my time on my
lonsome :'( so i am looking to see if a guild
will hear my pleas and take me in. </P>
<P>Much Desperate Pleading. </P>
<P>Nuada<BR>Elf Mage<BR>Druzil Ro</P></DIV></div><br
clear=all><hr>Send and receive Hotmail on your mobile
device: <a href='http://g.msn.com/1HM305301/13'>Click
Here</a><br>
<br>
